Manifest
========

The ``otter.manifest`` package contains the manifest models and utilities. The
manifest file is a way to provide tracking inforamtion on a run of otter.

.. seealso:: Refer to the `Manifest Specification <https://blog.opentargets.org/provenance-metadata/>`_
   for more information, although the schema has changed slightly since the blog
   post.
